title: Ticket #3731: Invalid MyString member function calls in dbms_utils.cpp
description: It seems that the function MyString::sprintf(...) has been renamed to MyString::formatstr(...). Thus, the calls to MyString::sprintf(...) in dbms_urils.cpp cause a build failure. This happens only if you configure condor with "WITH_POSTGRESQL=true".
remarks:
The attached patch is incomplete (and is for condor 7.8.7). I went through the code again and found more places where the old and non-existent method is used. The attached new patch should be complete now.

Hm, seems I can neither delete the attachment nor upload a new one. I'll create a new ticket. -> 4165
attachments:
• dbms_utils.patch 3469 bytes added by f.wolfheimer on 2013-Jul-01 19:46:54 UTC.
    This patch file renames all calls to MyString::snprintf to MyString::formatstr(...). According to the comments in MyString.hpp this is the new function which offers the same functionality as MyString::snprintf did for earlier versions.
creator: f.wolfheimer
